TopicTitle: loading KSP then going to your space station and it destroys it 0.90

Articles.Content:
As title I will load KSP then going to your space station and all thrusters and engines become engaged (oddly the main engine say for example a main sail on the back of the station fires 2 jets of flame, on down as normal and one 90 degrees to the side) and the station flys apart?, I notice when i have a rocket on the pad and i accelerate time, sometimes when returning to the pad same thing, the parts just fly all over the place and destroys the rocket.

In both cases the camera sort of 'drifts away' from the main focus point, any ideas?

If I approach the station in another rocket in game and I dont accelerate time on the pad to get the rocket going, it works fine and no destruction of anything.

Do you have any mods installed? If you do, please see the How to Get Support sticky in the Support (modded installs) forum. If not, see the Stock Support & Bug Reporting Guide. We'll need more information to help.
